segment.source: How to Configure Servers for Server-Based Deployment

segment.source: How to Configure Servers for Server-Based Deployment
segment.target: How to Configure Servers for Server-Based Deployment

segment.source: This section provides procedures you can use to configure the Microsoft System Center Application Virtualization (App-V) Management Servers and Microsoft System Center Application Virtualization Streaming Servers, and the Internet Information Services (IIS) and file servers, as appropriate for your Application Virtualization Server-based deployment strategy.
segment.target: This section provides procedures you can use to configure the Microsoft System Center Application Virtualization (App-V) Management Servers and Microsoft System Center Application Virtualization Streaming Servers, and the Internet Information Services (IIS) and file servers, as appropriate for your Application Virtualization Server-based deployment strategy.

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: How to Configure the Application Virtualization Management Servers
segment.target: How to Configure the Application Virtualization Management Servers

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for configuring the Application Virtualization Management Servers.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for configuring the Application Virtualization Management Servers.

segment.source: How to Configure the Application Virtualization Streaming Servers
segment.target: How to Configure the Application Virtualization Streaming Servers

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for configuring the Application Virtualization Streaming Servers.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for configuring the Application Virtualization Streaming Servers.

segment.source: How to Configure the Server for IIS
segment.target: How to Configure the Server for IIS

segment.source: Provides a step-by-step procedure for configuring the IIS server for your server-based deployment.
segment.target: Provides a step-by-step procedure for configuring the IIS server for your server-based deployment.

segment.source: How to Configure the Server to be Trusted for Delegation
segment.target: How to Configure the Server to be Trusted for Delegation

segment.source: Provides detailed instructions about how to configure the server to be trusted for delegation.
segment.target: Provides detailed instructions about how to configure the server to be trusted for delegation.

segment.source: Configuring the Firewall for the App-V Servers
segment.target: Configuring the Firewall for the App-V Servers

segment.source: Describes the firewall settings required for the App-V servers.
segment.target: Describes the firewall settings required for the App-V servers.

segment.source: How to Install and Configure the Default Application
segment.target: How to Install and Configure the Default Application

segment.source: Describes how to install and configure the default application for testing the App-V system.
segment.target: Describes how to install and configure the default application for testing the App-V system.
